review: First off this is a fantastic product. The quality that it streams to your TV is flawless, if you use a built in chomecast feature.Unfortunately, the chromecast has no browser capability, hence you cannot use it when you travel unless you have a mobile hotspot or some other way to connect to the internet. I purchased this product so I could stream to my TV while traveling. This fact alone was very disappointing. If google ever offers some sort of update so that you can jump on a browser to log into hotel internet, this would make the chrome cast much better.
author: John F. Watson

review: They make it sound like it will stream everything on your mobile devices. It in fact does not. It only streams apps and websites that support chrormecast. I really wanted to watch Direct TV Mobile and NBC Sports Live Extra and neither are supported. It did play Hulu + fine from my iPhone 5. But I already have ROKU and bought this for the streaming. Needless to say its going back.
author: G Cope

review: If it sounds too good to be true, it usually is. On paper, this is a great product.  But, we live on planet earth and this device is a few years away from what the marketing team slapped on the cover of the package.  This device is unable to maintain a solid connection to WiFi. Watching TV is all about turning off your brain and enjoying a few hours of relaxation.  This device will take all the fun out of watching your favorite shows and leave you frustrated and even angry at times. Do yourself a favor and spend $65 extra dollars for Apple TV, I did... I wish I'd done it sooner.-I would give it 3 stars on a good day.  It did work well at times, the other 90% of the time, it was 1 star material.
